Package de.thbin.epro.helm

Class HelmDeployer

java.lang.Object
de.thbin.epro.helm.HelmDeployer
@Service
public class HelmDeployer
extends java.lang.Object
Service to trigger deployment and uninstalling of helm charts. MUST be used with a helm-version prior to 3.1
Author:
Jannik NÃ¶ldner

  • Constructor Details

    • HelmDeployer

      public HelmDeployer()

  • Method Details

    • deployRedis

      public void deployRedis​(DeploymentSize size, java.lang.String id) throws java.io.IOException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Creates new Helm-Deployment, using a predefined helm chart. Values to vary deployment size are added before deployment
      Parameters:
      size - one of enumeration "DeploymentSize"
      id - String to identify Deployment
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when loading chart fails
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - when installing chart fails
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when fetching deployed release fails

    • uninstallService

      public void uninstallService​(java.lang.String id) throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException, java.io.IOException
      Uninstalls release identified by given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - identifies service to be uninstalled
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if uninstalling process fails
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if fetching UninstallResponse fails
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if fetching UninstallResponse fails
